notes: can mean the right-hand side or the political right
example_sentence_italian: La destra ha vinto le elezioni.
Non è facile trovare una destra unita.
example_sentence_english: It is not easy to find a united right.

example_sentence_italian: La destra ha proposto una riforma.
Le destre locali si sono espresse.
example_sentence_english: The local right-wing parties spoke out.

example_sentence_italian: Le destre europee si sono incontrate.
Delle destre hanno criticato la proposta.
example_sentence_english: Some right-wing parties criticized the proposal.

example_sentence_italian: Il programma della destra è chiaro.
example_sentence_english: The program of the right is clear.

example_sentence_italian: La sedia è alla destra del tavolo.
example_sentence_english: The chair is to the right of the table.
The comment comes from the right.
The criticisms come from the right-wing parties.

example_sentence_italian: Nella destra ci sono posizioni diverse.
example_sentence_english: Within the right there are different positions.
There is often discussion within the right-wing groups.
There is a small table on the right.

example_sentence_italian: Sulle destre si parla di economia.
example_sentence_english: On the right-wing parties they talk about the economy.
He hit with his right hand.
They collaborate with the local right-wing parties.
